text: James Cameron Blyth (born 27 November 1890) was a Scottish footballer who played for Dumbarton. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Association footballers not categorized by position Category:People from Govanhill and Crosshill
title: Jim Blyth (footballer, born 1890)
